short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You can send massive messages, and reach your potential clients much more

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension aids in gathering group data, sending mass messages, and automatically adding members. It doesn't require your account or password and operates locally in your browser.

Features:
✅ Mass collection of group usernames
✅ Mass messaging to lists of usernames/groups/phone numbers
✅ Automatic addition of members to groups

Save time and streamline your tasks with this user-friendly tool!


Note: Telegram Sender is an independent project and has no relationship to Telegram Inc.
